title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town encounter strange phenomena

episodes.title: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

episodes.title: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: As the town searches for a missing boy, a group of friends discovers a girl with telekinetic powers.

episodes.title: Holly, Jolly
episodes.description: A mother's search for her missing son leads to a series of mysteries and supernatural occurrences in the town.

episodes.title: The Body
episodes.description: The friends uncover a shocking truth about the missing boy as they confront a terrifying creature from another dimension.

episodes.title: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.description: A girl with telekinetic abilities joins the group as they face new challenges and a dangerous government conspiracy.

episodes.title: The Monster
episodes.description: The group battles a monstrous creature, and secrets about the government lab and the missing boy are revealed.

episodes.title: The Bathtub
episodes.description: The friends embark on a mission to rescue their friend from the parallel dimension, encountering new dangers and allies.

episodes.title: The Upside Down
episodes.description: The group faces a final showdown with the otherworldly threat as they try to save their friend and unravel the mysteries.

episodes.title: MADMAX
episodes.description: The town is shaken by the arrival of a new girl with a troubled past as the group faces a new threat.

episodes.title: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.description: On Halloween night, the group faces a series of challenges and encounters a mysterious figure from Eleven's past.

episodes.title: The Pollywog
episodes.description: A strange creature appears, leading the group on a mission to protect their town and uncover a dark secret.

episodes.title: Will the Wise
episodes.description: Will experiences strange visions, and the group uncovers a connection between the new threat and the parallel dimension.

episodes.title: Dig Dug
episodes.description: The group goes on a perilous journey to rescue their friend and confront the mysteries of the underground tunnels.

episodes.title: The Spy
episodes.description: As tensions rise, secrets are revealed, and the group faces betrayals that threaten to tear them apart.

episodes.title: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Eleven goes on a personal journey, encountering a gang of misfits with supernatural abilities.

episodes.title: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: The group confronts a powerful enemy as the supernatural threat intensifies, putting the town in grave danger.

episodes.title: The Gate
episodes.description: In a final battle, the group faces the source of the supernatural threat and fights to save their town.

episodes.title: Suzie, Do You Copy?
episodes.description: As the town celebrates the Fourth of July, a new threat emerges, and the group faces challenges on multiple fronts.

episodes.title: The Mall Rats
episodes.description: The group investigates strange occurrences at the new mall, uncovering a conspiracy that goes beyond their imagination.

episodes.title: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.description: The search for a missing lifeguard leads the group to a sinister plot involving mind control and secret experiments.

episodes.title: The Sauna Test
episodes.description: As tensions rise, the group faces a deadly challenge, and the true nature of the supernatural threat is revealed.

episodes.title: The Flayed
episodes.description: The group discovers a disturbing connection between the supernatural threat and the townspeople, leading to a race against time.

episodes.title: E Pluribus Unum
episodes.description: As the supernatural threat escalates, the group confronts a mind-bending reality and fights for the survival of their town.

episodes.title: The Bite
episodes.description: The group faces personal and collective challenges as the supernatural threat reaches a critical point, and sacrifices are made.

episodes.title: The Battle of Starcourt
episodes.description: In a climactic battle, the group confronts the supernatural threat, and the fate of the town hangs in the balance.

episodes.title: The Hellfire Club
episodes.description: A new mystery unfolds as the group encounters a secret society and delves into the dark history of their town.

episodes.title: Tick Tok Mr. Clock
episodes.description: Time is of the essence as the group races against a ticking clock to unravel a conspiracy and save their town.

episodes.title: You Snooze You Lose
episodes.description: The group faces unexpected challenges and must navigate a dangerous game that puts their lives on the line.

episodes.title: The Body Snatchers
episodes.description: A chilling discovery leads the group to confront a threat that takes on a horrifying new form.

episodes.title: The Great Escape
episodes.description: As the group plans a daring escape, they uncover shocking truths and face betrayals that test their loyalty.

episodes.title: The Dive
episodes.description: The group dives into the unknown, facing perilous challenges and discovering secrets that change everything.

episodes.title: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Old and new allies emerge as the group faces a formidable foe, and the past comes back to haunt them.

episodes.title: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: The supernatural threat reaches its peak, and the group must confront the true nature of the enemy to save their town.

episodes.title: The Gate
episodes.description: In a final showdown, the group battles the supernatural forces to close the gate and secure the safety of their town.

title: La Casa de Papel
description: A group of criminals plans and executes the perfect heist on the Royal Mint of Spain.

episodes.title: Do as Planned
episodes.description: The Professor recruits eight criminals to carry out the plan to rob the Royal Mint.

episodes.title: Lethal Negligence
episodes.description: The heist is underway, but mistakes and unforeseen events put the plan at risk.

episodes.title: Mistakes
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the criminals face unexpected challenges during the heist.

episodes.title: Trojan Horse
episodes.description: The Professor's intricate plan faces new threats as the heist progresses.

episodes.title: Groundhog Day
episodes.description: Repeating challenges test the robbers' resolve as they try to maintain control.

episodes.title: Warm Cold War
episodes.description: Internal conflicts and external pressures complicate the already complex situation.

episodes.title: Cool Instability
episodes.description: The heist faces a critical turning point with unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: You're Insane
episodes.description: The situation becomes increasingly dire as the Professor's plan is pushed to the limit.

episodes.title: A New Reality
episodes.description: The aftermath of the first heist forces the Professor and his team to adapt to a changed reality.

episodes.title: The Head of the Plan
episodes.description: New challenges and unexpected alliances emerge as the Professor faces formidable adversaries.

episodes.title: Rats
episodes.description: Internal and external threats escalate, putting the heist and the Professor's plan at risk.

episodes.title: Boom, Boom, Ciao
episodes.description: The heist reaches a critical moment as the Professor and his team confront their toughest challenges.

episodes.title: Red Boxes
episodes.description: The Professor's strategies are put to the test, leading to unexpected twists and turns.

episodes.title: Everything Seemed Insignificant
episodes.description: As the heist intensifies, personal relationships and loyalties are strained to the breaking point.

episodes.title: Subdued Astronomy
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face internal and external pressures as they navigate a complex web of challenges.

episodes.title: The Drift
episodes.description: The heist reaches its climax, with the Professor and his team facing the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: We're Back
episodes.description: The Professor reunites the team for a new heist, but old and new enemies complicate the plan.

episodes.title: Aikido
episodes.description: The heist faces unexpected challenges, testing the team's unity and resolve.

episodes.title: 48 Meters Underground
episodes.description: As the heist progresses, the Professor and his team confront unforeseen obstacles and betrayals.

episodes.title: The Perfect Crime
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the Professor's plan encounters unexpected complications and personal conflicts.

episodes.title: Berlin's Wedding
episodes.description: Flashbacks reveal key events as the Professor and his team grapple with emotional and strategic challenges.

episodes.title: Everything Seemed Insignificant
episodes.description: The heist reaches a critical juncture with new alliances, betrayals, and high-stakes decisions.

episodes.title: Little Vacations
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face escalating threats and internal conflicts as the heist unfolds.

episodes.title: The Fly
episodes.description: As the heist nears its climax, the Professor and his team confront the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Game Over
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face their toughest challenge yet as old and new enemies close in.

episodes.title: Tokyo's Wedding
episodes.description: Flashbacks and present-day events reveal key moments in the characters' lives as the heist reaches a climax.

episodes.title: Anatomy Lesson
episodes.description: The Professor and his team confront personal and strategic challenges with the heist on the line.

episodes.title: Spain's Breath
episodes.description: The heist faces unexpected twists and betrayals, pushing the Professor and his team to their limits.

episodes.title: 5 Minutes Earlier
episodes.description: As the heist approaches its conclusion, the Professor and his team confront the fallout of their choices.

episodes.title: TKO
episodes.description: The Professor and his team face their final challenges as the heist reaches its epic conclusion.

episodes.title: Strike the Tent
episodes.description: The aftermath of the heist reveals the fates of the characters as they come to terms with the consequences.

episodes.title: Paris Plan
episodes.description: Flashbacks and present-day events intertwine as the Professor and his team navigate the aftermath of the heist.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

episodes.title: The Mandalorian
episodes.description: A Mandalorian bounty hunter tracks a target for a well-paying client.

episodes.title: The Child
episodes.description: Target in-hand, the Mandalorian must now contend with scavengers.

episodes.title: The Sin
episodes.description: The battered Mandalorian returns to his client for reward.

episodes.title: Sanctuary
episodes.description: The Mandalorian teams up with an ex-soldier to protect a farming village.

episodes.title: The Gunslinger
episodes.description: The Mandalorian helps a rookie bounty hunter who is in over his head.

episodes.title: The Prisoner
episodes.description: The Mandalorian joins a crew of mercenaries on a dangerous mission.

episodes.title: The Reckoning
episodes.description: An old rival extends an invitation for the Mandalorian to make peace.

episodes.title: Redemption
episodes.description: The Mandalorian comes face-to-face with an unexpected enemy.

episodes.title: The Marshal
episodes.description: The Mandalorian is drawn to the Outer Rim in search of others of his kind.

episodes.title: The Passenger
episodes.description: The Mandalorian must ferry a passenger with precious cargo on a risky journey.

episodes.title: The Heiress
episodes.description: The Mandalorian braves high seas and meets unexpected allies.

episodes.title: The Siege
episodes.description: The Mandalorian rejoins old allies for a new mission.

episodes.title: The Jedi
episodes.description: The Mandalorian journeys to a world ruled by a cruel magistrate who has made a powerful enemy.

episodes.title: The Tragedy
episodes.description: The Mandalorian and Child travel to an ancient site.

episodes.title: The Believer
episodes.description: To move against the Empire, the Mandalorian needs the help of an old enemy.

episodes.title: The Rescue
episodes.description: The Mandalorian and his allies attempt a daring rescue.

episodes.title: The Apostate
episodes.description: The Mandalorian starts and important voyage

episodes.title: The Mines of Mandalore
episodes.description: The Mandalorian and Grogu explore the ruins of a destroyed planet

episodes.title: The Convert
episodes.description: The Convert

episodes.title: The Foundling
episodes.description: Din Djarin comes back to the secret mandalorian site

episodes.title: The Pirate
episodes.description: Nevarro residents need help fending off a fierce pirate attack

episodes.title: Guns of Hire
episodes.description: The Mandalorian visits an opulent world

episodes.title: The Spies
episodes.description: Survivors come out of hiding

episodes.title: The Return
episodes.description: Din Djarin and his allies face off against the enemy

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer navigates the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: High school chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. In a desperate bid to secure his family's financial future, he turns to a life of crime.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse try to dispose of the two bodies in the RV, and Skyler suspects that Walter is hiding something.

episodes.title: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.description: Walter fights with Jesse over their expanded drug operation. Skyler's plans to open a car wash take an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Cancer Man
episodes.description: Walter finally tells his family about his cancer. Meanwhile, Skyler is planning her sister's baby shower.

episodes.title: Gray Matter
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, while Hank struggles with his recovery. Saul offers Walt a solution to his money troubles.

episodes.title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.description: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer after a PTA meeting. Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market.

episodes.title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse try to produce a large quantity of meth for Tuco. Skyler confronts Walter about his actions, and Hank fights to keep Jesse in custody.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: Walter White's life begins to spiral out of control after his wife's confrontation with Jesse. Skyler's involvement with Ted grows deeper.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.description: Walter fights with Jesse over the secrets he is hiding, and Jesse meets Jane's father. Meanwhile, Skyler grows suspicious of Walter's activities.

episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.description: Walter tries to reconnect with his family, but Skyler is suspicious of his actions. Jesse ends up in rehab, and Jane's father seeks revenge.

episodes.title: Down
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse are held captive by Tuco, and Saul tries to arrange their release. Skyler tries to find out what happened to Walter.

episodes.title: Breakage
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse face difficulties in expanding their territory. Skyler confronts Walter about his mysterious behavior.

episodes.title: Peekaboo
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's distribution plans hit a snag, and Hank continues his investigation. Skyler's relationship with Ted becomes more complicated.

episodes.title: Negro y Azul
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's reputation in the meth world grows, attracting attention from law enforcement and rival criminals.

episodes.title: Better Call Saul
episodes.description: Walter hires a lawyer to help him navigate the legal issues surrounding his meth operation. Jesse goes to rehab, and Skyler grows more suspicious.

episodes.title: 4 Days Out
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse go on a marathon RV cook session, leading to unforeseen consequences. Skyler gets involved in Walter's business.

episodes.title: Over
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's business faces new challenges. Skyler makes a surprising discovery, and Jane's addiction takes a dark turn.

episodes.title: Mandala
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's operation expands, leading to new challenges. Skyler confronts Walter about his criminal activities.

episodes.title: Phoenix
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's business enters a new phase. Skyler's relationship with Ted intensifies, and Jesse deals with grief.

episodes.title: ABQ
episodes.description: Jane's death has a profound impact on Jesse. Walter's secret activities begin to unravel, leading to a tragic plane crash.

episodes.title: No Mas
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse face the consequences of the airplane crash, and Skyler confronts Walter about his criminal activities.

episodes.title: Caballo Sin Nombre
episodes.description: Walter considers a new job opportunity, and Jesse struggles with guilt. Skyler and Walter's marriage reaches a breaking point.

episodes.title: I.F.T.
episodes.description: Skyler kicks Walter out of the house, and Jesse gets involved with Jane's father. Walter continues his descent into the drug trade.

episodes.title: Green Light
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's partnership faces new challenges. Skyler is drawn deeper into Walter's world.

episodes.title: Mas
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's operation faces a threat, and Hank's investigation intensifies. Skyler considers her options.

episodes.title: Sunset
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's alliance with Gus Fring grows, leading to new opportunities and dangers.

episodes.title: One Minute
episodes.description: Hank faces a life-threatening situation, and Jesse confronts the consequences of his actions.

episodes.title: I See You
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse deal with the aftermath of the Cousins' attack, and Skyler grows suspicious of Walter's activities.

episodes.title: Kafkaesque
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse face challenges from all sides. Skyler becomes more involved in Walt's business.

episodes.title: Fly
episodes.description: Walter becomes obsessed with a fly in the lab, leading to tension between him and Jesse.

episodes.title: Abiquiu
episodes.description: Jesse wrestles with guilt, and Walter's relationship with Gus becomes more complicated.

episodes.title: Half Measures
episodes.description: Walter takes drastic action to protect Jesse, leading to dire consequences. Skyler's involvement in Walter's business deepens.

episodes.title: Full Measure
episodes.description: Walter faces a deadly ultimatum, and Jesse takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.title: Box Cutter
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's relationship with Gus becomes increasingly tense, leading to a shocking act of violence.

episodes.title: Thirty-Eight Snub
episodes.description: Walter buys a new gun for protection, and Jesse tries to distance himself from the drug trade.

episodes.title: Open House
episodes.description: Skyler gets involved in the car wash business, and Walter faces challenges from a new rival.

episodes.title: Bullet Points
episodes.description: Walter and Skyler attend a birthday party, and Jesse's actions have unforeseen consequences.

episodes.title: Shotgun
episodes.description: Jesse goes on a road trip with Mike, and Walter faces difficulties in his personal and professional life.

episodes.title: Cornered
episodes.description: Skyler's involvement in Walter's business becomes more complicated, and Jesse faces a moral dilemma.

episodes.title: Problem Dog
episodes.description: Jesse seeks therapy, and Walter's actions have repercussions for everyone involved.

episodes.title: Hermanos
episodes.description: Jesse's relationship with Andrea becomes complicated, and Walter's past actions come back to haunt him.

episodes.title: Bug
episodes.description: Jesse goes on a downward spiral, and Walter faces challenges from all sides.

episodes.title: Salud
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse face a dangerous situation in Mexico, and Skyler's involvement in Walter's business deepens.

episodes.title: Crawl Space
episodes.description: Walter's life takes a dark turn, and Jesse tries to make amends for his past actions.

episodes.title: End Times
episodes.description: Walter's actions have severe consequences, and Jesse's life is in danger.

episodes.title: Face Off
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's conflict with Gus reaches its climax in a deadly showdown.

episodes.title: Live Free or Die
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse face the aftermath of their confrontation with Gus, and Hank begins to piece together the puzzle.

episodes.title: Madrigal
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse's new business faces challenges, and Hank's investigation intensifies.

episodes.title: Hazard Pay
episodes.description: Walter and his team navigate the challenges of their new operation, and Skyler grows more suspicious of Walter.

episodes.title: Fifty-One
episodes.description: Walter celebrates his birthday, and Skyler makes a decision that has far-reaching consequences.

episodes.title: Dead Freight
episodes.description: Walter and his team plan a dangerous train heist, and Jesse's moral compass is tested.

episodes.title: Buyout
episodes.description: Walter and his team face the fallout from the train heist, and Jesse makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.title: Say My Name
episodes.description: Walter and his team confront a new adversary, and Hank inches closer to the truth.

episodes.title: Gliding Over All
episodes.description: Walter considers leaving the drug trade, and Hank makes a major breakthrough in his investigation.
